message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it, but I have to be honest with you, I'm looking to get a good price for it. I'm willing to start at $1,200,000. What do you think?
Alice, your offer is still too high for me. I'm really interested in this product but I can't go over $1,000,000. If you're willing to come down to that price, we can make a deal.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1,000,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,100,000, but I need to make a profit on this sale. What do you think?
